Author: jorian#4555
Content:
i have an issue regarding locktime on multisig addresses on an assetchain. I'm using VRSC Agama and it creates a tx which i decoded on the left side of the screenshot. on the right side, it is the manually created one on the command line, witihout a locktime set (but with expirytime set, as i see now)

i checked the locktime of the left transaction and it is the current time, so after the creation of the tx, it has elapsed and it should be unlocked to be broadcasted. However, when trying to broadcast, it shows me a `code: 1, the transaction was rejected by network rules. non-final code -26` error. 
can anyone tell me why the Agama VRSC created tx is non-final?

Author: jorian#4555
Content: i have successfully done multisig transactions on Agama VRSC before, so i'm not sure what is going wrong here

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: how long ago was 8 blocks ago?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: locktime uses median time

Author: jorian#4555
Content: So this would be fixed if we don't use locktime at all

Author: jorian#4555
Content: we = i

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: then it would be final. usually setting the locktime to current time has a chance of being rejected

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: set it to 10 minutes ago

Author: jorian#4555
Content: üëç

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: @jorian this has some background history related to why it exists: https://github.com/KomodoPlatform/komodo/blob/master/doc/bitcoin-release-notes/release-notes-0.11.2.md#bip113-mempool-only-locktime-enforcement-using-getmediantimepast

Author: jorian#4555
Content: oh thanks

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: since KMD has different block times, some of the values (such as 1 hr) are not correct from that BTC relnotes, but I found it educational to read. I have read all the code, but that doesn't quite tell the full story

Author: jorian#4555
Content: ok. well it doesn't really serve a purpose other than locking coins to the future, so at default locktimes could be disabled for assetchains, right?

Author: jorian#4555
Content: i'm digging the agama source to find out where it sets the locktime

Author: jorian#4555
Content: <https://github.com/VerusCoin/Agama/blob/d13e9ba199380b622bfdb81605b13d3ce4c43538/routes/api/electrum/createtx-multi.js#L506>

Author: jorian#4555
Content: seems to be it, but it's in `electrum` folder, where i am signing it using agama native

Author: jorian#4555
Content: i'll go bug the verus community with this tomorrow
